General.Name: S&W Seed Company
General.Description: S&W Seed Company, an agricultural company, engages in breeding, growing, processing, and selling alfalfa and sorghum seeds. It also offers sunflower, stevia, camelina, wheat germplasm, wheat, and pasture seeds. The company sells its seeds to distributors and dealers in 40 countries. S&W Seed Company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Longmont, Colorado.
General.Address: 2101 Ken Pratt Boulevard, Longmont, CO, United States, 80501-6085
